trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som håndterer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound"> </xref> hendelser i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>denne hendelsen oppstår når et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontrollen er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is data bound to a source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>denne hendelsen oppstår når et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontrollen er dataene som er bundet til en datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataListItemEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en DataListItemEventHandler representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet representanter [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
